object.name: ChatMemberBanned
object.description: Represents a chat member that was banned in the chat and can't return to the chat or view chat messages.
object.html_description: Represents a chat member that was banned in the chat and can't return to the chat or view chat messages.
object.rst_description: Represents a `chat member <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#chatmember>`_ that was banned in the chat and can't return to the chat or view chat messages.

annotations.description: The member's status in the chat, always 'kicked'
annotations.html_description: The member's status in the chat, always “kicked”
annotations.rst_description: The member's status in the chat, always 'kicked'
annotations.name: status

annotations.description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for this user; Unix time. If 0, then the user is banned forever
annotations.html_description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for this user; Unix time. If 0, then the user is banned forever
annotations.rst_description: Date when restrictions will be lifted for this user; Unix time. If 0, then the user is banned forever
annotations.name: until_date
